programme.title: Hurikán
programme.sub-title: Zábavný program
programme.desc: Smršť nezabudnuteľnej televíznej zábavy s Petrom Marcinom a Andym Krausom! Legendárna televízna šou, ktorá bola akýmsi prirodzeným pokračovaním obľúbeného Uragánu, z ktorej vzišiel napríklad aj azda najznámejší internacionálny, nedobrovoľne vtipný tandem, ktorý tvoria Slovák ako repa František Stromokocúr a jeho štíhlejšie maďarské druhé ja László Komárom! Okrem nekorunovaných majstrov skvelej televíznej zábavy Petra Marcina a Andyho Krausa divákov vtedy i dnes teší i množstvo zaujímavých hostí z radov celebrít v zvyčajných i nezvyčajných úlohách...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2020).
programme.desc: Syn a vnuk: László túži po ťuťu-muťu, veď šestonedelie Ildikó už dávno skončilo, ale ona nič. František tiež prežíva manželskú krízu. Nepáči sa mu, že Zuzana celé dni sedí doma v nátačkách a župane. Fero má šťastie. Hoci býva nakrúcanie teleshopingu iba raz do týždňa, dnes bude mimoriadne navyše. Zuzanu a Andrejku pri prezliekaní prekvapí poštár, ktorý ignoruje, že reštaurácia sa zmenila na štúdio. Z pohľadu na vyzlečené baby má šok. V parku František flirtuje s mladými mamičkami. Tvrdí im že Evan je jeho syn. László naopak Ágostona predstavuje ako svojho vnuka, lebo sa hanbí. Keď si dcéra pani Jarmilky udrie kolienko, František jej ponúkne ošetrenie u seba v byte. Zuzana ich pristihne v momente, keď tvrdí, že sa rozvádza, lebo jeho manželka má milenca. Navyše Evan v parku nájde mŕtvolu, ktorú ho László v panike nechá strážiť. Ako vysvetlí František Zuzane návštevu atraktívnej mamičky? Ako dopadne László, keď sa informácia, že kočíkuje vnuka dostane k Ildikó?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2020).
programme.desc: Jenifer: František spal za trest na balkóne. Jeho mamičke sa nepáči, čo sa deje so Zuzanou a zasahuje. Prišla poupratovať a upozorniť syna, že ho Zuzana chce svojim správaním donútiť, aby sám požiadal o rozvod. Jej podozrenie sa prehĺbi, keď nájde schovanú obálku s peniazmi, o ktorých František nevie. Zuzana ešte aj podozrieva Františka, že stále flirtuje s mladými mamičkami. Ildikó chce, aby sa László zamestnal v ich škole ako školník a k Ágostonovi chce najať španielsku aupairku. László by sa radšej staral o syna a bol na "otcovskej" materskej. Podarí sa mu presvedčiť Ildikó, že je ten najlepší otec, aj keď z parku privezie omylom domov v kočíku malú Jenifer? Nájde László svojho syna včas, aby zachránil zúfalú Ildikó, svoje manželstvo a svoju budúcnosť? Naozaj sa chystá Zuzana opustiť Františka? A kedy bude dokončená prerábka spoločného bývania Milky a Gergelyho?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2020).
programme.desc: Policajná akadémia I.: František vyčíta Zuzane, že stále o seba nedbá. Zuzana tvrdí, že mu to vadí, lebo je celé dni doma a nepracuje. László je nevyspatý. Dychový alarm Ágostona každých päť minút pípa. Má ho namontovaný na kočíku aj postielke. Ildikó manipuluje Zuzanu, že postrážia aj Ágostona, keď už denno-denne strážia Evana. V parku mestský policajt prinúti Františka s Lászlóom upratať všetky špaky po fajčiaroch. Ukáže sa, že práve prebieha nábor na nových príslušníkov. Lászlóovým detským snom bolo stať sa policajtom. Hneď začne s prípravou na skúšky. Dokonca pôjde na zácvik. Predtým však dokončí posledné úpravy v byte a konečne tam odsťahujú Milku s Gergelym. František sa vráti do práce na Lesnej správe. Ako sa skončí Lászlóov konflikt s arogantným psíčkarom? Kto bude Ferovým šéfom? A vyspí sa konečne vo svojej posteli?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2020).
programme.desc: Halászlé: László má pohovor na mestského policajta, ale musí sa postarať aj o Ágostona. V parčíku konečne otvorili bufet a susedov prekvapí, koho tam stretnú. László nakoniec nechá syna na starosť poštárovi. Ten však posunie dieťa bufetárovi, ktorý však tiež nemá čas. Ildikó nájde dieťa u bezdomovca, ktorý ho vraj aj nakŕmil. Dal mu na obed halászlé z vývarovne. Františkova mamička videla Zuzanu a Martu s počerným fešákom a podozrieva ju z nevery. Ágoston večer veľmi plače, ale nie je to nič výnimočné. Bytovka už podpísala petíciu na sociálny úrad, aby to prešetrili. Čo má Zuzana s počerným fešákom? Nájde sa recept na upokojenie Ágostona?

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Pätnásty plat. Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Horno-dolniaci si vyplatili pätnásty plat a v obecnej pokladnici teraz chýbajú peniaze.

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Gorila. Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Na maškarnom plese v Hornej Dolnej sa objavila neznáma maska. A bola to vôbec maska?

programme.title: Hurikán
programme.sub-title: Zábavný program
programme.desc: Smršť nezabudnuteľnej televíznej zábavy s Petrom Marcinom a Andym Krausom! Okrem nekorunovaných majstrov skvelej televíznej zábavy Petra Marcina a Andyho Krausa divákov vtedy i dnes teší i množstvo zaujímavých hostí z radov celebrít v zvyčajných i nezvyčajných úlohách...

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Big Animal Surgery (1)
programme.desc: Lion. In a South African sanctuary, Liz meets a nine-year-old lion called Ricci whose teeth are in such rough shape he can't eat; specially trained vets use unique tools and slightly more anaesthetic than estimated on the wakeful patient.

programme.title: Big Animal Surgery (2)
programme.desc: Chimpanzee. In Sierra Leone, a young chimpanzee deals with a potentially cancerous growth on her abdomen; wildlife vets deliver a diagnosis then get a fright mid-surgery.

programme.title: Big Animal Surgery (3)
programme.desc: Elephant. A majestic Asian elephant who survived a catastrophic flood at his zoo in Tbilisi, Georgia has a badly infected tusk; surgeons race to remove the tusk and save the gentle giant's life.

programme.title: The quick and the slow
programme.desc: Hit the gas with hawks, cheetahs, and other speed demons to learn why first-in-class acceleration can be an evolutionary advantage. Then pump the brakes with Earth's biggest slowpokes to see why, sometimes, slow and steady really does win the race.

programme.title: Podvodníci IV (19)

programme.title: Mladiství zabijáci (4)
programme.desc: Dok. seriál. Zní to až neuvěřitelně, avšak i takový jsou mezi námi. Mladí lidé připravení zabíjet, v některých případech, i své vlastní rodiče.

programme.desc: Dok. seriál. Tento seriál představuje posledních 48 hodin obklopujících případy, které otřásly společností. Za účelem objasnění zločinu a vynesení rozsudku je zkoumán každý dějový zvrat.

programme.desc: Dokument. Sledujte příběhy žen, které se rozhodly pomstít svým něvěrným protějškům originálním způsobem.

programme.title: Podvodníci IV (17)
programme.desc: Zábavný dok. seriál. Podvodníci jsou klasický pořad Zone Reality. Podezřívaví jedinci se obrací na tento pořad a skupina soukromých vyšetřovatelů zjišťuje zda jejich partner má či nemá milostný poměr.

programme.title: Mladiství zabijáci (2)
programme.desc: Dok. seriál. Zní to až neuvěřitelně, avšak i takový jsou mezi námi. Mladí lidé připravení zabíjet, v některých případech, i své vlastní rodiče.

programme.title: 48 hodin XVII (2)
programme.desc: Dok. seriál. Tento seriál představuje posledních 48 hodin obklopujících případy, které otřásly společností. Za účelem objasnění zločinu a vynesení rozsudku je zkoumán každý dějový zvrat.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Snow Queen. Alice and Lewis make a "snow-woman" in the Queen’s likeness. But, miffed at not bearing a very strong resemblance to the original, she heads off to meet her model. Our two heroes are scared: their mockery is about to be discovered! But surprise surprise!: the Queen is anything but offended! In fact, she takes the snow-woman under her wing, even going so far as to appoint her her deputy! Unfortunately for Alice and Lewis, this icy substitute becomes just as moody as the Queen: now they’re going to have to do all they can to remind her who she truly is!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Blue Door Mystery. Queen is seething: her QueenMobile has broken down on the other side of Wonderland and she hasn’t found any blue doors to get her back home. So she commissions Alice and Lewis to draw up a map of all the blue doors in the Kingdom. The mission turns out to be more complicated than expected when our heroes realize the doors in question are VERY FIDGETY!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: In the wild. Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Missing Teddy. Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Bean’s life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: No Parking. Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - 'Titanic'. Now he simply has to park the car. But when you're Mr Bean, nothing's simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Artful Bean. There’s easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration – and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.sub-title: Baby Shark V2 (Hide and Seek Version)
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: That's so Madhu. Madhu has special presents for Ella and Slippy, to celebrate the anniversary of the day they met. But when Ella and Slippy say they can’t hang out, Madhu is sent off with only Maggie for company

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Ghost Story. Slippy has heard a rumour that the abandoned outpost the gang plans to visit is haunted so he brings his ghost detector goggles, just in case! Ella assures him that there are no such things as ghosts, but then odd things begin to happen.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: For the Win. Ella’s mom is a hall of fame Enceladus 500 race champion, and Ella wants to be just like her! She plans to skate, scooter race and geyser jump her way to a championship trophy!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Highs and Lows. Ella and Slippy have been practicing their rock-climbing skills, so that they can tackle the recently formed, huge crater on Saturn’s moon, Enceladus. Ella, however, prefers relying on her space boots to get her to the top of the rock wall

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Tail of Two Kitties. Ginger accidentally backs her car over Butch's tail. Feeling awful, she brings the alley cat into her home until he's feeling better. Butch is finally getting what he's wanted, much to Tom's chagrin, especially now that Ginger's having him take care of the poor injured cat. Jerry revels in the situation until he realizes that two idiot cats are more trouble than one and Jerry's getting his butt whooped. Now Jerry must prove that Butch is rehabilitated in order to return him to the alley where he belongs and return his life.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Vanishing Creamed. Hildie is mixing a batch of foot balm that'll soften and beautify her gnarly-looking feet. She has Tom rub it in, nice and good. Unfortunately, the foot balm is a little too strong and makes her foot disappear. Hildie's recipe may be a foot balm bomb but it gives Tom a good idea. He'll use it to "vanish" into thin air. Jerry literally doesn't know what hit him when the invisible cat bats him around like a ball of yarn. Tom is unaware when the effects begin to wear off and Jerry is able to defend himself. When Jerry gets a hold of the cream, it's his turn to have the upper hand. A battle of the vanishing cream ensues, each using it in various ways to outwit the other.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Unhappily Harried After. It's Tom's wedding day! He's getting married to Toodles in a backyard wedding that we're experiencing through the eyes of his best friend, Jerry. Puuuuurfeeecttt in every way, then the crap hits the mouse hole: Tom is given Jerry as a wedding gift. When it can't possibly get worse Jerry wakes up and tosses Toodles out of the house!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: In The Beginning. We open on a SOLD sign in front of what will be Rick and Ginger's house. Inside, the house is empty – no Rick, no Ginger, no Tom, no furniture. Just Jerry, who slip slides merrily across the bare floors – the place all to himself. That is until the front door opens and Rick and Ginger arrive in their new home. Ginger screams having just seen a mouse and tells Rick to get Tom out of the moving van. Like most cats in a new place, Tom doesn't want to come out from beneath the recently placed couch, but Ginger demands he catch that mouse! And so we watch the beginning of a lifelong adversarial relationship unfold one gag at a time!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.sub-title: Splinter of Discontent. Tom & Jerry help Tyke with a splinter.
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Uncle Pecos Rides Again. Tom and Jerry are in the middle of it when Tom hears someone singing the tale of a cat who met his unfortunate, painful end chasing a much superior opponent. The song is about underestimating your opponent. Every time Tom stops chasing Jerry, the music stops. When Tom resumes, the music resumes. This back and forth continues until the chase takes Tom right past a Singing Uncle Pecos. Tom skids to a stop causing Uncle Pecos to stop singing. Tom wants to prove the lyrics of Uncle Pecos song wrong, but in the end, Tom's ego proves to everyone, including himself, that he is very much the subject of Uncle Pecos cautionary tale.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Lighthouse Disco
programme.desc: Lighthouse Disco

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Ball. The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road. Paralysed with vertigo sixty feet up on a windowsill, he is eventually brought to earth by the helpful intervention of a neighbour’s pet gerbil.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Toothache. Bean’s sweet tooth leads him to despair when he bites off a bit more than he can chew. He is tormented by the toothache from Hell - and embarks on a hilarious mission to pull out this menace. Bean’s DIY attempts fail to succeed, and he is left with no other choice but to visit the dreaded dentist. But can Bean brave the Dentist’s chair? Or will the dentist despair when faced with Bean’s antics?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Haircut. After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all round…but then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by… his hair.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Neighbourly Bean. As Mr Bean settles down to watch his favourite TV programme he hears loud noises from next-door. He moves from house to garden but can’t escape the relentless cacophony of trumpets, electric drills, and screaming babies. Bean’s mind turns to thoughts of revenge….

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Trainee Book-Wizards. Before heading off on a trip to find new seeds, the Book-Wizard entrusts his garden to his new apprentices, Alice and Lewis. But it’s a pretty stressful experience: besides having to tend to the garden, they also have to answer the Twins when they come to ask for advice, and entertain the Queen when she decides to turn up unannounced, for teatime! And when Charlie gets whisked away by a bird-book, it’s panic-stations for the two apprentices. In fact, things get so out of hand that they have to call the Book-Wizard to the rescue!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Heel! What a disaster!: the Queen’s favorite booties have gone missing! And if Alice and Lewis don’t find them, they’re going to have to shine all fifty-thirteen other pairs of shoes in her majesty’s possession! Hot on the heels of the mischievous boots, our two heroes must use clever tactics to persuade them to get back to the Queen’s feet!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Constellation Prize. Slippy’s attempts to impress his cousins with constellation drawings goes awry, causing them to get lost in a nebula! As the nebula messes with their racers and gadgets, escape becomes hopeless. It’s up to Ella and Madhu to find a way to guide them safely back home!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Space Junk. When Space Junk smashes into their clubhouse, Ella and Slippy set off to fix the problem. While Ella wants to be rid of the junk, Slippy’s determined to reuse or at least recycle it. When Ella is trapped, re-using space junk may be the only way to save her!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Calorie Count. Jerry's high-born cousin Count DaCalories—a haughty city mouse—visits the estate. At first, he acts sleek and refined, but soon he can't resist pigging out and going on multiple kitchen raids. As his paunch grows, it becomes more and more difficult for him to outrun Tom and stay out of sight of the Duchess's visitor.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Fortune Hunters. When Stinker, the trash-loving dog, comes by looking for help, Tom and Jerry aren't inclined to take the case until they hear it involves a missing fortune. So, they're disappointed when they find out Stinker is searching for a lost fortune cookie from his Chinese takeout to learn his fate. Retracing the dog's steps, they chase the fortune cookie's trail through town.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Game Changer. As Jerry and Tuffy play marbles, Tom throws a soccer ball in their direction and upsets the game. This sparks a chase between Tom and Jerry, and Jerry takes cover in a room that looks like a giant chessboard. As more chess pieces show up, Tom and Jerry attempt their best to outplay them.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Kiss and Makeup. Tom is chasing the mice around the haunted house when midnight strikes, and he finds himself face-to-face with a green-faced beast who's just as surprised to encounter Tom. It's soon revealed to be Toodles, who's a good witch brewing magic beauty products. Although Tom is enchanted at first, things stop going smoothly when he helps with her potions.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Suitable for Framing. A ghost paints a flattering portrait of Tom, but Tom is stingy with his payment and the ghost casts a spell on the portrait. Strange things start happening as the portrait absorbs injuries and calories that should be affecting Tom. However, soon Jerry and Tuffy figure out what's going on and use it to their advantage.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Springtime for Spike. When Rick and Ginger are asked to dog-sit for a friend's French poodle, Sabrina, Tom is initially on his guard, but soon he's practically eating out of her hand. Next, Spike falls for Sabrina and does everything he can to impress her with how kind he is to Tom. How long will everyone's behavior be affected by Sabrina's presence?

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Big Little Problems. How can one little golf ball cause a crater the size of a house? By hurtling through space - that’s how! One little rock can cause a chain reaction by hitting bigger and bigger pieces.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The Big Break. After hurting her leg, Ella has to take it easy for an entire day. Does she have the patience to sit and rest for that long? When she runs out of activities at home, Ella’s dad offers to take her along on one of his towing operations

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Magpie. When nursing an injured magpie in his room, Mr. Bean learns something the rest of us already know: magpies can’t help stealing anything that sparkles. When the police arrive to investigate the theft of his landlady’s jewellery, it’s not just Mr. Bean that needs to take flight.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Cat-Sitting. After a head-on collision with the milkman, Mr. Bean’s landlady is rushed to hospital, leaving him to look after her odious one-eyed cat Scrapper. Fur isn’t the only thing that flies and in the end it’s Bean that needs looking after.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Bottle. Mr. Bean is delighted with his new ‘ship in a bottle’ until it mistakenly ends up on a milkman’s float. He frantically pursues his prize possession, only to see it disappear into a milk bottling plant at the local dairy. Getting it back promises to be a mission of the impossible.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Goldfish. With his teddy bear at the dry cleaners, Mr. Bean finds himself feeling lonely. Fortunately, a new playmate appears in the shape of a goldfish from the garden pond. Bean has a great time with his new best friend until, at the seaside, he discovers that some fish are gigantic, have large pointed teeth and fins on their backs.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Nia and the Ducks
programme.desc: Nia and the Ducks

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II
programme.desc: The Tallest Munchkin. Lion's regular rounds as King of the Forest are thrown out of whack when he meets Devin, a boy who says he's a giant Munchkin, who's been shunned by the other Munchkins. But when Dorothy and her friends convince him to embrace his uniqueness, Devin returns to Munchkinland and competes in the annual dance-a-thon to show he belongs among the Munchkins as much as anyone.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: In The Doghouse. Mike is forced to spend the day outside in his doghouse due to Grandma Mikkelsen's fur allergy. Mike makes the best of being exiled and plans to spruce the place up and invite Iris over for an outdoor picnic. But Mercury has been kicked out of his lair after a fight with his brother and decides to squat in the doghouse. Mike does everything he can to wake up the snoozing raccoon and get him out of his home. It looks like he's going to have to bring in the big guns if has any chance of evicting his unwanted guest before Iris shows up.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Who's The Boss. Tom walks in and catches Mercury trying to break into in the garage. He thinks Mercury would make the cool, exciting pet he's always wanted. To Mike's horror, Tom makes him promise to make sure nothing happens to Mercury while he's at school. Mike, ever the obedient pooch, does his best but the turtles want Mercury out of the house. Mercury is making himself way too comfortable. Mike will need to use all his brainpower to kick the unwanted guest out of the house and enlists Freddy as an unlikely ally.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Trojan Racoons. The raccoons find a brilliant way of getting into the Mikkelsen's house without anyone noticing by getting mailed to the house inside in a cardboard box. Mike falls for it and the raccoons are free to steal whatever they want in their few minutes of freedom inside the house. The racoons skedaddle back to their lair, but instead of stealing the loot, Mercury brings back an old grandfather clock that belonged to the family's grandmother. Now Mike has to break into the raccoon's lair, retrieve the family heirloom and give the raccoons a taste of their own medicine.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Freeze-All Cutie-Twee. Alice and Lewis find the twins frozen in place! It turns out to be the doing of a young Freeze-All Cutie-Twee who has become friends with Charlie. In fact, these two besties are having the time of their lives, traveling all over the place, freezing the whole Kingdom, unaware that the young Cutie-Twee has not yet mastered its powers! Alice and Lewis must find a way to persuade Charlie to take the Cutie-Twee back to its peers.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Not a Piece of Cake! When the Wonderland cuckoos realize their precious wild strawberry pies have all been picked, it’s mayhem! They go bonkers, screeching up a storm, almost deafening our poor friends. The Queen subsequently orders Alice and Lewis to put an end to this din! But the mission gets tricky when our two heroes find out who picked the pies!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Palladium Quest. When a friendly game accidentally breaks Maggie, Ella and co set out to find a rare metal to help fix her. But it’s a metal so rare it’s only in asteroids! After a few unsuccessful attempts, they realize the knowledge Maggie gave them before she broke could help save the day!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Friendship Supernova. Slippy wants to watch an eclipse so badly that he makes special safety goggles for himself and his friends. But Ella has a different plan. When she insists on going to watch a binary star supernova, Slippy opts out and heads off on his own.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Momella Day. Ella always looks forward to Momella Day. And this Momella day promises to be the most interstellar yet, because they are going to see a small but powerful Red Dwarf star!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The Martian Chronicles. Priya has arrived from Earth to complete a school project about Mars. Priya is unfamiliar with the planet and a bit nervous about its huge dust storms. Ella, Slippy and Madhu convince her she needs to visit Mars.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Home Insecurity. After Rick and Ginger install a high-tech, state-of-the-art home security system, Tom and Jerry's shenanigans activate the home's automation system. Using the system against each other, they quickly lose control and the house shuts them down.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Tom-Fu. During one of their regular cat-and-mouse scraps, Tom is accidentally knocked out. When he awakens, he discovers that he's become a kung-fu master. It's now up to Jerry, Tuffy and Spike to reverse the process before they spend their lives getting Tom-Fu'd. If only someone could get near him...

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Jerry Rigged. After yet another unsuccessful attempt to catch Jerry, Tom falls under the influence of a traveling cat salesman named Carver, who sells him a series of elaborate mousetraps, tricks and schemes. Setting out to dish up a "world of hurt" on Jerry, Tom only managed to injure himself.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Downton Tabby. In a post-Edwardian era, Tom lives in the basement of an impressive manor belonging to an aristocratic family. When the Butler asks him to rid the house of a troublesome mouse upstairs, he also promises him a life of comfort upstairs if he succeeds. Unfortunately for Tom, Jerry overheard the entire conversation, making Tom's opportunity all the more challenging.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Pillow Case. Unable to sleep because of the incessant barking from a dog somewhere in the city, Tom and Jerry must track down the noisy mutt. When they find the dog with the help of a friendly bat, they discover the pup can't sleep without her special pillow. Now, for the sake of everyone's sleep, the great pillow case is on!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Too Loud Nia
programme.desc: Too Loud Nia

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Royal Bean. When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers there's only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majesty's corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Young Bean. When did Mr. Bean first meet his teddy bear? Did he really learn to drive his mini at the age of ten? Could he possibly have known his battle-axe of a landlady when she was a sweet and blushing bride? Bean takes us on a journey into the past, answering these questions and giving us an inkling as to what made him the man he is today.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: In the pink. Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean can’t bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Dinner for two. Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when you've got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Snow Queen. Alice and Lewis make a "snow-woman" in the Queen’s likeness. But, miffed at not bearing a very strong resemblance to the original, she heads off to meet her model. Our two heroes are scared: their mockery is about to be discovered! But surprise surprise!: the Queen is anything but offended! In fact, she takes the snow-woman under her wing, even going so far as to appoint her her deputy! Unfortunately for Alice and Lewis, this icy substitute becomes just as moody as the Queen: now they’re going to have to do all they can to remind her who she truly is!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Blue Door Mystery. Queen is seething: her QueenMobile has broken down on the other side of Wonderland and she hasn’t found any blue doors to get her back home. So she commissions Alice and Lewis to draw up a map of all the blue doors in the Kingdom. The mission turns out to be more complicated than expected when our heroes realize the doors in question are VERY FIDGETY!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Maggie 2.0. When a botched update causes Maggie to reboot as “Magz”, a super fun party animal, Ella, Slippy and Madhu are excited! At least until “Magz” excessive ways put them all in danger! Now, our gang have to figure out how to get Maggie 1.0 back, pronto!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Interstellar Message. When a probe arrives from Madhu’s sibling, our gang sets off to find something amazingly special to send back! But despite their incredible adventure to obtain some super cool moon water - Madhu realizes the most special “thing” they have isn’t a thing at all...

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Plant Food. At midnight, a gothic lady cat appears with her favorite sinister plant creatures including her personal favorite: Fang, a big man-eating plant. As long as it's sealed in the hothouse, nothing can go wrong. But Tom, Jerry and Tuffy soon have their hands full with the escaped plant.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Whack a Gopher. Ginger and Rick's vegetable garden is growing, and they need a way to keep out the gophers. Ginger says traps are cruel, but Tom can handle the task! However, things start getting out of hand when a lady gopher falls in love with Jerry, and the two plan a garden raid together.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Hula Whoops. Tom and Jerry take a case for Toodles' cousin in Hawaii, hoping to sneak in some rest and relaxation, but it's no vacation. The cousin's missing pineapple plant is only the starting place of the investigation as Tom and Jerry track down the culprit in this tropical environment.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: A Game of Bones. After Tyke digs up, Hammy, Spike's lucky bone, Spike reburies it right away because it's bad luck to remove it. Soon afterward, Tom gets a set of toy dog bones that do tricks, and he teases Spike and Tyke with them. When the whirly-bone buries itself and unearths Hammy for a second time, Spike recruits the other animals to help prevent the bad luck he expects.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Bull Fight. Tom and Jerry take a case from a mother tortoise to find out where her son Seymour is sneaking off to at night. They discover Seymour is self-training to win a championship boxing match, planning to pay off bills with the prize money so his mom can quit the car wash. When he offers Tom and Jerry a cut of the money to keep his secret, they take it and agree to train him—but it won't be easy.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: No Contest. After entering Tyke in an agility contest, Spike sets up a course for the puppy in the backyard. Soon, Spike decides the course isn't hard enough and gets Tom to help, bending Tom into pretzel-like positions for Tyke to leap over, through, or into. After all this preparation, Tyke must still make it to the competition on time.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: For the Win. Ella’s mom is a hall of fame Enceladus 500 race champion, and Ella wants to be just like her! She plans to skate, scooter race and geyser jump her way to a championship trophy!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Highs and Lows. Ella and Slippy have been practicing their rock-climbing skills, so that they can tackle the recently formed, huge crater on Saturn’s moon, Enceladus. Ella, however, prefers relying on her space boots to get her to the top of the rock wall

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Neighbourly Bean. As Mr Bean settles down to watch his favourite TV programme he hears loud noises from next-door. He moves from house to garden but can’t escape the relentless cacophony of trumpets, electric drills, and screaming babies. Bean’s mind turns to thoughts of revenge….

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Nurse! Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to 'break' his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesn't enjoy.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Dead Cat. Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landlady’s vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that it’s rubbish collection day.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Supertrolley. Nipping to the shops for a few provisions becomes a nightmare when a mile-long shopping list from his landlady and a clapped out trolley with a wonky wheel conspire to ruin his day. Subscribing to the theory that bigger is better, he constructs his own shopping trolley incorporating a petrol mower, pram wheels and an extra pair of hydraulic hands.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike Flu. Poor Mike is bedridden. He's been struck down by a nasty cold so Iris and the turtles are forced take care of his every need, including trying to repel the raccoons from the house. Fighting raccoons isn't their specialty and Iris and the turtles quickly end up locked in the garage. Mike is forced to intervene but he's so sick and weak that he's a pushover. How can he overcome the raccoons this time? Mike's problem could be the very solution he needs to defeat the tenacious raccoons.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Ditzy Home. Stephan upgrades the house's security system and it looks like Mike might be able to take a break from playing guard dog. The new system immediately detects when the raccoons are trying to break in and ejects from the property. Mike didn't even have to lift a paw. Unfortunately, the system works a little too well and quickly targets Mike as an intruder too. Now Mike and Freddy are on the same team trying to break in so he can defeat the errant security system and save Mercury and Fluffy who are still trapped inside.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Journey to the Moon. While delivering a yummy stew to the Queen, Alice and Lewis notice the moon is crying and that its falling tears are flooding the castle! Afraid her royal residence is about to collapse any minute, Queen orders Alice and Lewis to find a solution to this problem on the double! And so off they go to the moon, where a whole plethora of surprises awaits them.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Seam Stress. Today, Queen has decided to commission a unique dress from her talented Seamstress Card: she wants it made out of wild thread – a very difficult one to tame! And should her Seamstress Card fail to pull it off, she will be relieved of her duties on the spot! Alice and Lewis jump to it, coming up with all kinds of bright ideas to help out the poor card. As a result, in the end, a whole cat walk of dresses awaits the Queen!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Constellation Prize. Slippy’s attempts to impress his cousins with constellation drawings goes awry, causing them to get lost in a nebula! As the nebula messes with their racers and gadgets, escape becomes hopeless. It’s up to Ella and Madhu to find a way to guide them safely back home!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Space Junk. When Space Junk smashes into their clubhouse, Ella and Slippy set off to fix the problem. While Ella wants to be rid of the junk, Slippy’s determined to reuse or at least recycle it. When Ella is trapped, re-using space junk may be the only way to save her!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Commander Slippy. The gang is playing tag the Meteoroid when Glitch fails to follow Slippy's instruction. He soon realises it's because Glitch saw the comet he's been tracking for months! Slippy is excited - he gets to tag a comet!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Earthbound Priya. Ella and Slippy are perfecting their triple corkscrews when Priya, Ella’s best friend from Earth, surprises her with a visit. Priya performs a perfect triple corkscrew to everyone’s amazement. Ella is frustrated that she still can’t nail it

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Hiccup and Away. When Tom gets the hiccups, the witches decide that the only way to cure him is to scare him, so they banish him to the Wicked Forest of Very Scary Things. Unfortunately, there really isn't anything that frightening in, so they enlist Jerry to conjure up some scares – a task that he's only too happy to oblige, by taking full advantage of the situation.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: I Quit. After a particularly rough cat-and-mouse chase, Jerry quits! Tom is stunned as he watches his little friend storm off to his hole, pack up his belongings and leave for another house. It's only days later as Jerry's gaining weight and a lonely Tom unsuccessfully looks to Spike for companionship and a new mouse-mate (named Mickey!) that they realize how much they need each other.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: You Can't Handle the Tooth. When Hildie and Beatie bring home a magic ogre's tooth, they warn Tom and Jerry not to touch it. Naturally, they both try to get the other one to touch it, until they accidentally both touch it and discover it has greater powers than they ever could imagine. Now, neither of them want to let it go!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Pain for Sale. When Rick plans a big yard sale for the next morning, Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to find Tyke's first puppy collar in the gear before it's sold. Accidentally locked in the garage all night, Tom and Jerry end up battling with every yard sale toy, gadget, yard tool and houseware item at their disposal.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Return to Sender. When Hildie receives another dozen black roses from a secret admirer, her curiosity is piqued. Sending Tom and Jerry to find out the identity of the mystery admirer, they end up at the Enchanted Flower Shop across the forest, where they encounter some frightful arrangements and a few "dead ends."

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Surprise!
programme.desc: Surprise!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Treasure! In a dark and cobwebby corner of his attic, Mr. Bean finds a treasure map. The hunt is on! But tricky clues lead Bean up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Homeless. After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Camping. An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem – but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Chocks Away. When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by that of a rival kid, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge. Next day, his newly constructed fighter plane, almost ready for take-off, sadly lacks a vital part – and the blinking model shop is shut! No matter. It’s chocks away with Teddy at the controls, fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Freeze-All Cutie-Twee. Alice and Lewis find the twins frozen in place! It turns out to be the doing of a young Freeze-All Cutie-Twee who has become friends with Charlie. In fact, these two besties are having the time of their lives, traveling all over the place, freezing the whole Kingdom, unaware that the young Cutie-Twee has not yet mastered its powers! Alice and Lewis must find a way to persuade Charlie to take the Cutie-Twee back to its peers.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Not a Piece of Cake! When the Wonderland cuckoos realize their precious wild strawberry pies have all been picked, it’s mayhem! They go bonkers, screeching up a storm, almost deafening our poor friends. The Queen subsequently orders Alice and Lewis to put an end to this din! But the mission gets tricky when our two heroes find out who picked the pies!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The Crystal Contingency. Ella and Tilly’s playtime results in the smashing of precious crystals that are part of Mom’s meticulous experiments. Determined to replace them, Ella battles a pulsar and then a super-hot planet before she realizes her sidelined little sister could be a big help!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Jupiter's Moons. Slippy’s excited to try out his new Rocket Boosters. He’s so excited that he overloads them and becomes stranded on a dangerous moon with Madhu. It’s up to Ella to jog Madhu’s memory so they can find the right moon and save Slippy!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Saddle Soreheads. Bedfordshire Bertie, a champion show horse, runs away and hides on the estate grounds, where Jerry does his best to help her hide from nosey Tom. Bertie is stressed out over a big upcoming meet, but Jerry has a calming effect on her. When Tom catches up with them, he, too, helps the horse overcome her nerves and get back to her old self.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Rosemary's Gravy. Because of an injured foot, Rick stays home with Ginger's mother, Rosemary, taking care of him. Rosemary brings her infamous fat-free-dairy-free whole wheat gravy, and she quickly puts Rick, Spike and Tom on nutritious diets. Antics and fights break out as Rick and the pets crave real food.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Eggs on a Train. Peter, a pretentious cheapskate poodle, demands that Tom and Jerry help protect his precious sapphire egg on a train journey but won't pay their fare. The cat and mouse become stowaways and go to a lot of trouble to do their job, but the outcome is unexpected.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Truffle Trouble. While mopping the kitchen floor, Tom uses an odd-looking sponge on a plate to clean up the mess. But the "sponge" turns out to be a rare truffle, which the estate's new pig ate. To pacify Cates, Tom and Jerry must find out whether the animal is also good at hunting truffles.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Cuckoo Clock. Ginger places her granny's old cuckoo clock in the hall, and it still works! However, the newly arrived clock causes issues when Tom wants to catch the tiny wooden bird inside and Tuffy wants to befriend it.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: That's so Madhu. Madhu has special presents for Ella and Slippy, to celebrate the anniversary of the day they met. But when Ella and Slippy say they can’t hang out, Madhu is sent off with only Maggie for company

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Ghost Story. Slippy has heard a rumour that the abandoned outpost the gang plans to visit is haunted so he brings his ghost detector goggles, just in case! Ella assures him that there are no such things as ghosts, but then odd things begin to happen.

programme.title: Batwheels

They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Dinner for two. Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when you've got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Ball. The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road. Paralysed with vertigo sixty feet up on a windowsill, he is eventually brought to earth by the helpful intervention of a neighbour’s pet gerbil.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Toothache. Bean’s sweet tooth leads him to despair when he bites off a bit more than he can chew. He is tormented by the toothache from Hell - and embarks on a hilarious mission to pull out this menace. Bean’s DIY attempts fail to succeed, and he is left with no other choice but to visit the dreaded dentist. But can Bean brave the Dentist’s chair? Or will the dentist despair when faced with Bean’s antics?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Haircut. After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all round…but then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by… his hair.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Skiff Upon the Sea
programme.desc: Skiff Upon the Sea

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Surprise!
programme.desc: Surprise!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hoverboard. Mike is impressed with Tom's hoverboard tricks and decides to try to master them to impress Iris. As soon as Tom steps out, Mike tries to get his hands on the board but the turtles have other ideas. In fact, everyone seems to want a turn on the hoverboard, including the raccoons. It's the perfect way for them to get their loot from the house to their den. Mike is going to have to step up if he wants to defeat the raccoons and get Tom's hoverboard back.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hypnosis. Mike wakes up in the bathtub, huh? The house has been turned upside down and the other animals are being weird. They're acting like zombies and carrying food out of the house. Our pug discovers that the raccoons have hypnotised Fluffy, the turtles, and Iris, and are using them to transport the contents of the Mikkelsens fridge to their lair. Our hero will need to confront Iris to save her from the raccoon's dastardly scheme... and refill the Mikkelson's fridge!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II
programme.desc: The Tallest Munchkin. Lion's regular rounds as King of the Forest are thrown out of whack when he meets Devin, a boy who says he's a giant Munchkin, who's been shunned by the other Munchkins. But when Dorothy and her friends convince him to embrace his uniqueness, Devin returns to Munchkinland and competes in the annual dance-a-thon to show he belongs among the Munchkins as much as anyone.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.
